column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I think I'm just not the biggest deep dish fan. It tastes good
column2: and Lou's is known for its butter crust
column4: I definitely think there is better pizza in the world. One thing I also dislike is that the temperature of the pizza is not hot enough when it comes out. I think the cheese should be very stringy
column5: but wen you actually cut into it
